author: Special Correspondent
text:
‘Farm Fresh’ outlet established on Tirunelveli Supermarket premises has sold fruits and vegetables worth Rs. 3.50 lakh within a month.

After inspecting the outlet on Monday, Collector M. Karunakaran said that over 3,000 customers had purchased Rs. 3.50 lakh-worth fruits and vegetables ever since it became operational in mid-January. Since the prices of fruits and vegetables being sold at the outlet was 25 to 35 per cent less than the open market prices, over a hundred customers were purchasing the farm produces at the outlet every day.

“As the customer base of the outlet is increasing steadily, the farmers may sell their produces to this outlet directly to get better prices. Now, we’ve fixed a sale target of Rs. 50,000 a day for the outlet,” Dr. Karunakaran said.
title: ‘Farm Fresh’ outlet sale at Rs. 3.50 lakh within a month
